sn35.118:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
sn35.118:4.2: Atha kho sakko devānamindo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.118:4.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.118:4.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti?
sn35.118:4.6: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
sn35.118:5.1: “Santi kho, devānaminda, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.118:5.2: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.118:5.3: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.118:5.4: Saupādāno, devānaminda, bhikkhu no parinibbāyati … pe ….
sn35.118:6.1: Santi kho, devānaminda, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.118:6.2: santi kho, devānaminda, manoviññeyyā dhammā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.118:6.3: Tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.118:6.4: Tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.118:6.6: Ayaṃ kho, devānaminda, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme no parinibbāyanti.
sn35.118:7.1: Santi ca kho, devānaminda, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā, iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.118:7.2: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.118:7.3: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato na tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti, na tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.118:8.1: Santi kho, devānaminda, jivhāviññeyyā rasā … pe …
sn35.118:8.2: santi kho, devānaminda, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.118:8.3: Tañce bhikkhu nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn35.118:8.4: Tassa taṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato na tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ hoti na tadupādānaṃ.
sn35.118:8.6: Ayaṃ kho, devānaminda, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo yena midhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti.
